name: Goodrich Aviation
about: Goodrich Aviation, located at the Greater Binghamton Airport, is a multifaceted aviation services company offering comprehensive flight training, aircraft rental, sales, and maintenance services. Since 1998, our Pilot Training Center has provided a fun and rewarding learning experience, emphasizing affordability and quality. We use the Cessna 172, equipped with state-of-the-art GPS navigation, and offer flexible payment plans. Our professional instructors cater to various schedules, and our maintenance shop ensures top-notch aircraft condition. We provide training for private, commercial, instrument, and flight instructor certificates, as well as additional services like flight reviews and multi-engine training. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, Goodrich Aviation is your trusted partner in achieving your aviation goals.
services:
["Biennial Flight Review
Ground School
